alert.note: Alert for Bay; Calhoun; Gulf; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 25 at 8:01AM EST until January 25 at 8:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Jackson County in the Panhandle of Florida... Gulf County in the Panhandle of Florida... Southeastern Bay County in the Panhandle of Florida... Calhoun County in the Panhandle of Florida... South central Seminole County in southwestern Georgia... * Until 830 AM EST/730 AM CST/. * At 801 AM EST/701 AM CST/, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northwest of Chattahoochee to near Mexico Beach, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Blountstown, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Chattahoochee, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Altha, Honeyville, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Selman, Abe Springs, Chipola Cutoff, Cape San Blas, Chipola, Henderson Mill and Overstreet. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST/1000 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST/1000 AM CST/ for Big Bend of and the Panhandle of Florida.
